title: lagging problem
body: hey , im from malaysia but why my ping on oceania is 300+ .. it should be at 100+ but now its increase to 300 ... pls help me .. i want to play on oceania thx

replies.body: You shouldn't be getting such high ping if you're on a decent internet connection. What ISP do you use?

I have no information or experience with UNIFI, sorry. And a speed-test to a different server doesn't really tell us anything.

You can ping the League servers directly using a command prompt, if on Windows. To do so, press Winkey+R to open up the Run app. Type in "cmd" and hit Enter. This will bring up the command prompt. Copy the following text (excluding quotation marks) "ping oce.leagueoflegends.com", right-click the command prompt and click Paste. Do not use Ctrl+V, it will not work.

After a brief moment of pinging, something along the lines of "Minimum = 50ms, Maximum = 60ms, Average = 55ms" should be shown. Tell me what that is for you.

13ms.

What the hell; I live in Victoria but the best I get is 48ms. It's definitely not your connection then.

Is it like, even though it says you have 300 ping, the game behaves as if though your ping was below 50?
nah its delay af .. sometime my ping goes to 300+ .. and sometime it goes to 500+ .. srsly why oce hate malaysian so much :/
That is crazy. I'd say contact UNIFI and ask them about why this might be happening.
